item.title: The Power of Scripture
item.description:
The Power of Scripture by Elder Richard G. Scott, Of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles given in the Saturday Morning session of the 181st Semiannual General Conference on Fri Sep 30 2011
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone.
